description: Detects when when a mounted share is removed. Adversaries may remove share connections that are no longer useful in order to clean up traces of their operation Author: oscd.community, @redcanary, Zach Stanford @svch0st. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Administrators or Power users may remove their shares via cmd line
name: Mounted Share Deleted
query: (process.parent.executable:*\\net.exe AND process.executable:*\\net1.exe AND process.command_line:*share* AND process.command_line:*\/delete*)
